text.text:
:inbox_tray: Your asset submission will be processed in *<https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1xG4s7C3jUo6iuZGiFUgP91QXVCmKXslyx4EY6hYkmKs/edit?gid=162051327#gid=162051327|Content Delivery>*, and then delivered via #content-drops.

:label: The production code is *{{ $json.productionCode }}*, which you can use for tracking purposes.
